text: A streaming service announced as Apple Video

notes: • "1-2 months for free, bundled with Apple Music as an option"

text: Apple (of its own choice, not in direct response to a legal case) will allow developers to use payment methods outside the App Store
full-pick-text: Apple (of its own choice, not in direct response to a legal case) will allow developers to use payment methods outside the App Store
notes: • In 2024, Apple did update this policy, but it was in response to Epic Games v. Apple.

text: Apple announces a new paid service
full-pick-text: Apple announces a new paid service

full-pick-text: Apple announces a video game subscription service

text: Apple announces an update to AirPods Max, that support wireless lossless playback, to take full advantage of Apple's new classical music service
full-pick-text: Apple announces an update to AirPods Max, that support wireless lossless playback, to take full advantage of Apple's new classical music service
notes:
• Working with Apple Classical is part of the pick, meaning that if Classical is not introduced it will be incorrect.
  • This was edited to be any AirPods, but then Stephen went back to the more passionate original pick.
  • Not a reuse of the infamous DAC pick, but in a similar vein.

text: Apple announces original podcast content
full-pick-text: Apple announces original podcast content
notes: • In 2020, Apple did come out with Apple News Today, and has since introduced other shows as well.

text: Apple announces something with podcasts
full-pick-text: Apple announces something with podcasts

text: Apple gives another extended free period of TV+ with new product purchases, even if you already had a trial
full-pick-text: Apple gives another extended free period of TV+ with new product purchases, even if you already had a trial
notes:
• The pick went through a little more revision after round 2 ended.
  • Apple extended the existing free period for TV+, which does not count
  • Myke notes that, since this extension was announced via press release before the event, a differently-worded pick may have been ambiguous based on the rules at the time, so an explicit rule about the scoring window is added.

text: Apple introduces new Fitness+ workouts
full-pick-text: Apple introduces new Fitness+ workouts

notes: • This came later in the year as a result of an antitrust settlement with Japan.

text: Apple Music Classical ships
full-pick-text: Apple Music Classical ships

text: Apple Music will be redesigned again

• "Will gain more Spotify-like algorithmic features"
  • "An Apple version of the Daily Mix and a way to discover back catalog songs from artists you don't know (Discover Weekly?)"
  • The New Music Daily feature would eventually come in 2019.
